name: third-party-widget
description: An example of third-party widgets from React components

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ ./preactify.js ] -t [ babelify ] -p [ bundle-collapser/plugin ] -s PaymentForm src/js/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.build:watch: NODE_ENV=develop watchify -t [ ./preactify.js ] -t [ babelify ] -p [ bundle-collapser/plugin ] -s PaymentForm src/js/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && uglifyjs build/bundle.js -m -o build/bundle.min.js
